arraySize.description: The size of the array, if this is an array batch job. Valid values are integers between 2 and 10,000.

jobAttempts.description: The number of times to attempt to retry, if the job fails. Valid values are 1 to 10.

jobDefinition.description: The ARN or name of the job definition to use if the event target is an AWS Batch job. This job definition must already exist.

jobName.description: The name to use for this execution of the job, if the target is an AWS Batch job.
